description: I am happy to be here in energy filled surroundings: PM @narendramodi begins his address at the University https://t.co/KtrH9I7q2j — PMO India (@PMOIndia) July 11, 2016
caption: nm-4.com
message:
Spent time at the University of Nairobi, a glorious institution with a formidable reputation. Interacted with some of the brightest & best minds of Kenya. Spoke on the rich legacy of Kenya, accomplishments of Kenyans in various fields & how Kenya has a right ecosystem for innovation-led growth. 

Told my young friends- a safe, prosperous Kenya & a strong Africa is your destiny. Let no one take it away from you. 
http://nm-4.com/chps
